Invocation Name: news infinity
des: Ad-free premium news service for free. If you love science and keep yourself up-to-date with the latest science news from 100% authentic sources, you are most welcome to try this skill. Every news is scanned by A. I. Gauntlet System . This is the age of Artificial Intelligence. Why to navigate websites or blogs for the latest news and scientific articles? Infinity News enables you to have them all just in one application. You can read or listen to the news and even explore the news details for furthermore digging. Exciting features: 1. Infinite news and articles each time you launch this application. 2. Real-time news with zero latency. 3. AI Gauntlet System Security. 4. Latest news presented by AVS engine. 5. Supports Alexa Application for Mobile. 6. APL visualization for Display enabled devices. 7. Mobile display visualization. 8. Smart Navigation with voice and touch. 9. News Shuffling 10. Your news preferences ** Please, email me to (me.mehedi@hotmail.com) for your valued recommendations and idea to implement here. To learn more, please ask alexa, "Alexa, Ask news infinity for introduction". To send your recommendations, please say, "Alexa, Ask news infinity for feedback from (your name) is (your feedback)" and alexa will ask for your feedback. Reply to her with your feedback. Set Routine: Allows you to listen to News Infinity by adding Daily routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps: 1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines. 2. Click + to add a new routine. 3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one. 4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills". 5. Choose "Your Skills" > Select News Infinity 6. Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
